descriptionHtml:
-----------
Description
------------

Here it is, my Christmas mod. 

Adds 7 varieties of scarves and 5 varieties of lanterns and candles, which can be found in a gift box under a tree in Windhelm ( See Pic )

I'm not an expert in texturing, so some of the scarves texture is not very good and some clipping issue with the armors and clothes

Will adds more stuff later in the future. mainly from the Gothic and Witcher resource sets

The scarves don't add anything, so it's pretty much useless, Lantern and candle had the same function as the vanilla torch.


Thank [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/394634]Chaos_Hellfire[/url] for the review

and Happy new year!

[youtube]Wz2CNWM8IbA[/youtube]









----------
Permissions and Credit
------------
Scarves mesh contained part from Natterforme Scarve of Skyrim mod, Thank for giving me the permission to use the mesh [img]https://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/thumbsup.gif[/img]
All scarves are retexture by me
